alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:21AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Adair, southeastern Wagoner, Cherokee and northeastern Muskogee Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 320 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Peggs to near Hulbert to Fort Gibson. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Muskogee... Tahlequah... Stilwell... Fort Gibson... Westville... Okay... Hulbert... Adair State Park... Eldon... Proctor... Christie... Peggs... Maryetta... Cookson... Cherokee Landing State Park... Scraper... Bunch... Sequoyah State Park... Baron... Lost City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
